segments.text: Are there any special unemployment forms I need to fill out ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You need to get a special application form .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you know where I can find the application form ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can go to the Employment Development Office and pick it up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What records will I have to show to apply for unemployment benefits ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They will need a record showing who you worked for and when you worked for them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there anything else I will need to provide ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Be prepared to show a written notice of your termination as proof .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do I need to do anything else after I turn in the application ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You will receive a notice for a phone interview , which will continue the process .
segments.speaker: S2
